EmailTemplate.name: ICPS_Released_for_Delivery_Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: ATTENTION: Your item/s have been {!ICPS__c.ABFReason__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ICPS__c.ReceiverName__c}
Australian Border Force has advised that your item {!ICPS__c.Name} is now {!ICPS__c.ABFReason__c}.
Please contact 131 881 if any further questions.
Yours faithfully,
Australia Post
